answers.answer: It all confusingto me too but what I did was cut out sugar all together and with carbs its hard because you pretty much cut out everything but fruits and veggies. So go easy on carbs.
Do 45 grams of carbs three times a day and 15 grams twice. Veg u don't have to count and stuff like cheese u don't have too count, fruits are high in sugar.  That's the diet I'm on
